name: simple-mediasoup-example
description: Complete example using Simple MediaSoup client and server libraries

scripts.generate-certs: mkdir -p certs && openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout certs/key.pem -out certs/cert.pem -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -subj '/C=US/ST=CA/L=San Francisco/O=Simple MediaSoup/OU=Development/CN=localhost'
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run generate-certs
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:types

author: Simple MediaSoup
